Those of you who dislike NTR, you can look at it these ways.  Sadly his cock is too small so he can probably never win her back, so he can either attempt to kill said husband out of revenge, fuck the shit out of her, possibly kill her out of revenge, or move the fuck on.   Or maybe grow a pair since he's quite young.  Get a bigger dick and fuck another blonde big boob girl.  Life isn't over.

A big difference between NTR and Netori, a lot of NTR the girl breaks up with the guy (husband or whatever) but in Netori, most of the time it ends with "Oh I still love my husband/boyfriend/whatever but I can't live without your cock."  Depending on which way you swing, having them still be together while you bang them can be something and also just flat out breaking their heart and leaving them too from obviously your perspective.  So, interesting take from both genres.
